text: Patrice "Pat" Wymore (December 17, 1926 - March 22, 2014) was an American actress and singer. She was best known as a movie, television, and stage actress during the 1950s and 1960s. She was born in Miltonvale, Kansas. She was married to Australian actor, Errol Flynn, from 1950 until his death in 1959. Wymore died from lung disease on March 22, 2014 in Portland, Jamaica. She was 87 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Kansas Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Singers from Kansas
title: Patrice Wymore
